name: Remote Desktop Manager Report Settings File
summary: Learn about .RDR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: An RDR file is created by Remote Desktop Manager when report settings are exported. To create the RDR file, select your report in Administrations - Report then click Export Settings.
You can generate a report using settings from an RDR file by entering the following command line in the Windows Command Prompt:
